name: TechnoSophos @ GitHub
body:
I blog [at TechnoSophos.Com](http://technosophos.com). I tweet [@technosophos](http://twitter.com/#!/technosophos).

You might be looking for...

* [QueryPath](http://querypath.org): It's like jQuery for PHP.
  - Read an old [IBM DeveloperWorks article](http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/opensource/library/os-php-querypath/index.html?S_TACT=105AGX01&S_CMP=HP)
  - Google's blog called QueryPath [an essential part of the Drupal and PHP communities](http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2010/08/sixth-annual-summer-of-code-flexes-some.html)
* [Pronto.js](https://github.com/technosophos/Pronto.js): A Node.js Chain-of-Command runner.
  - See [this article](http://mobiledrupal.com/building-mobile-app-api-using-drupal-nodejs-and-mongodb) about how it is used to power a mobile app.
  - Or check out [my blog post](http://www.technosophos.com/content/prontojs-how-consumersearchs-mobile-api-server-driven-nodejs) with a brief explanation of what Pronto is.
* [Fortissimo](https://github.com/technosophos/Fortissimo)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
